name: Tumblr Dashboard Icons; Flags.
description:
Made by http://fanspazzness.tumblr.com/ Tumblr. http://diabolicalwolf.deviantart.com/ Deviantart.
Thank you so much for using! Please report to either one of those URLs if something isn't working correctly.
Flags are just generic. You may request custom dashboard icons if you want.

THANK YOU~
additional_info: I really am not sure if this works in Firefox, as I made it for Chrome. If anyone has Firefox, please tell me if it works or not. Thank you~
